name: Wigwam SynchroKnit Surpass Lightweight Mid Crew Sock - Unisex
categories: SynchroKnit Surpass Lightweight Mid Crew Sock
description: Less is more?  The surpass sock uses SynchroKnit™ Powered by Wigwam design. Removing stitches from unneeded areas of the sock, produces a more performance and precise foot like fit.SynchroKnit™ contour knit, removes unneeded fabric creating a precise fit.Lightweight zone cushioning for comfort.Arch saddle holds sock in place.Seamless toe closure.
